title: Is Taliyah the new Azir?
body: I swear to god, some people say Taliyah is shit, some people say she's broken as shit. I've been playing her a lot and i think, YES she is strong, but you also need to be an experienced player with her. I just don't want her to get nerfed bc people at higher elo can play her to an extent where she is broken like Azir. I think the current Taliyah is PERFECTLY FINE, her kit takes skill to use and you can tell a very big difference between a good and bad Taliyah.
